description: After a healthier snack for the family? Try this cookie recipe packed with strawberries, banana and cacao nibs. There's something exciting in every bite.
name: Healthier Strawberry & Cacao Oat Cookies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 280g Macro organic rolled oats (save 25g for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line two large baking trays with baking paper.
Place rolled oats in a food processor and process until very finely chopped.
Place banana in a medium bowl and mash with a fork until smooth. Add syrup, cinnamon and egg, then stir to combine.
Add processed oats, strawberry and half of the cacao nibs to banana mixture and stir to combine.

Roll 2 tablespoonfuls of mixture into balls, place on trays and press down to form 5cm rounds. Sprinkle with extra oats and remaining cacao nibs. Bake for 35 minutes or until golden. Allow to cool on trays completely. Serve.
